articles.title: Country superstar Charley Pride dies aged 86 - The Guardian
articles.description: Pride, the first black inductee into the Country Music Hall of Fame, died from complications related to coronavirus
articles.content:
The singer Charley Pride, the first black superstar of country music, died on Saturday at the age of 86.
